query:
ALTER TABLE notification_preferences
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS debtMilestonesEnabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Debt payoff milestones',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS debtPaymentRemindersEnabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Payment due reminders',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS debtStrategyUpdatesEnabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Strategy recommendations',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS learningAchievementsEnabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Learning milestones',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS streakRemindersEnabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Daily practice reminders',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS quizResultsEnabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Quiz completion notifications',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS factUpdatesEnabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Verified fact updates',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS systemAlertsEnabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Important system updates',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS securityAlertsEnabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Security-related alerts';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3nggiiWQDu5Xrc9.root --database 8mC6ZNEwokHKmKSGT6E4hn --execute ALTER TABLE notification_preferences
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS debtMilestonesEnabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Debt payoff milestones',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS debtPaymentRemindersEnabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Payment due reminders',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS debtStrategyUpdatesEnabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Strategy recommendations',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS learningAchievementsEnabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Learning milestones',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS streakRemindersEnabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Daily practice reminders',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS quizResultsEnabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Quiz completion notifications',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS factUpdatesEnabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Verified fact updates',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS systemAlertsEnabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Important system updates',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS securityAlertsEnabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Security-related alerts';
